title: Citi First to Offer Contactless PayPass Stickers in Hungary
summary: Budapest, Hungary - Citibank Hungary is first in the Hungarian market to offer its credit card customers a MasterCard PayPass-enabled Sticker that allows them to make payments at PayPass terminals in a fast and convenient way for purchases up to HUF 5,000. The Sticker can be placed on the back of mobile phones or any other personal objects, such as business card holders, purses or notebooks, and it is available for customers holding a Citi Life Multipartner Reward Credit Card, a Shell-Citibank or a Telekom-Citibank co-branded card.
tag-1: Citi First to Offer Contactless PayPass Stickers in Hungary
tag-2: Budapest, Hungary – Citibank Hungary is first in the Hungarian market to offer its credit card customers a MasterCard PayPass-enabled Sticker that allows them to make payments at PayPass terminals in a fast and convenient way for purchases up to HUF 5,000. The Sticker can be placed on the back of mobile phones or any other personal objects, such as business card holders, purses or notebooks, and it is available for customers holding a Citi Life Multipartner Reward Credit Card, a Shell-Citibank or a Telekom-Citibank co-branded card.
tag-3: Batara Sianturi, Citi Country Officer for Hungary, said, "We are focused on enhancing our customers' lives with innovative technologies, and our goal is to become the world's leading digital bank. With this new digital solution, we are making payments even faster and more convenient for our customers, complimented by the existing benefits that come with using their Citibank credit card including earning cash back or rewards points for purchases."
tag-4: Jon Wiggins, Consumer Business Manager for Citibank Hungary, remarked: "Keeping to our promise to continuously enhance the customer experience, we just made the back of their mobile phones the best feature. Our customers are busy, often using their phone for everything from finding a good restaurant to searching for a new TV. We want to be there for our customers, providing information, payment options, products and services, wherever and however they choose."
tag-5: The Citi Life Credit Card program provides a 3 percent return on food retail purchases of up to HUF 100,000, a 2 percent return on petrol spends up to HUF 50,000 and a 1 percent return on all other retail purchases across Hungary in addition to existing benefits such as collecting Citi Forints and discounts between 2-15 percent at 22 Citi Life Program Partners. Telekom-Citibank co-brand card customers receive a cash back of 1 percent of the value of their purchases, and 10-20 percent cash back from their Magyar Telekom invoices paid by direct debit. The Shell-Citibank co-branded card offers real benefits to customers who regularly travel by car, allowing them to collect rebates by using their credit cards for Shell fuel purchases as well as regular daily shopping at any outlet.
tag-6: There are more than 100,000 PayPass terminals in 14 countries in EMEA, and more than 6,000 in Hungary, including fast food chains, groceries, health and beauty shops, cafés, news-stands, cinemas and other specialty shops.
tag-7: More information on the Citibank Sticker and the PayPass functionality are available at www.citibank.hu/paypass.
tag-8: Important information Citibank Credit Card APR: 29.7-52.1%. Citibank provides Credit Cards and Stickers in line with the terms of its own loan appraisal. 3% refund on domestic food retail spend made with Citi Life card up to HUF 100,000; 2% refund on domestic fuel spend up to HUF 50,000; and 1% refund on transactions exceeding the previously stated thresholds within the monthly timeframe of the settlement period. 20% refund in the first three months from the approval of Telekom-Citibank card, maximum amount of HUF 5000 refund per month on direct debit transactions, 10% refund from the fourth month, maximum HUF 2,500 refund per month; 1%, maximum HUF 2,500 refund per month on purchases and direct debit transactions. 3% refund on domestic fuel spend made with Shell-Citibank card up to the amount of HUF 100,000; and 1% refund on any other goods or services (non-fuel) purchased at Shell petrol station or at any other Acquiring Places in Hungary or abroad up to HUF 250,000 within the monthly timeframe of the settlement period. The first PayPass purchase with Citi Life card should be with the usage of chip and PIN. For purchases completed with the use of the PayPassTM function for security or other reasons the terminal may request the PIN regardless of the amount involved.
